django.core.serializers.pyyaml
==============================

.. py:module:: django.core.serializers.pyyaml

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   YAML serializer.

   Requires PyYaml (https://pyyaml.org/), but that's checked for in __init__.



Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.core.serializers.pyyaml.DjangoSafeDumper
   django.core.serializers.pyyaml.Serializer


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.core.serializers.pyyaml.Deserializer


Module Contents
---------------

   Bases: :py:obj:`yaml.CSafeDumper`


   .. py:method:: represent_decimal(data)


   .. py:method:: represent_ordered_dict(data)


.. py:class:: Serializer

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.core.serializers.python.Serializer`


   Convert a queryset to YAML.


   .. py:attribute:: internal_use_only
      :value: False



   .. py:method:: handle_field(obj, field)


   .. py:method:: end_serialization()


   .. py:method:: getvalue()


.. py:function:: Deserializer(stream_or_string, **options)

   Deserialize a stream or string of YAML data.
